TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurfaceManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurfaceManager Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurfaceManager : IDisposable, IServiceProvider
type DesignSurfaceManager = class interface IServiceProvider interface IDisposable

span.span: Manages a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类旨在作为容器的对象。The class is designed to be a container of objects. 它提供公共服务该句柄事件之间的路由设计器，属性窗口和其他全局对象。It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects. 使用是可选的但建议如果您计划让多个设计器窗口。Using is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows. 类提供了一些设计时服务自动。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 您可以通过将它们替换在受保护覆盖每个这些服务属性。You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected property. 若要替换服务，重写构造函数、 调用基类，和通过受保护的任何更改属性。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 已添加到服务容器的所有实现服务释放设计图面管理器时，将释放接口。All services added to the service container that implement the interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed. 类提供为默认服务的接口。The class provides the interface as the default service. 提供设计器事件的全局事件处理机制。 provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events. 通过此机制，应用程序将设计器变为活动状态时得到通知。With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active. 该服务提供设计器的集合和其中全局对象，如属性窗口中，可以监视选择一个位置更改事件。The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property ActiveDesignSurface As DesignSurface

public: virtual property System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ ActiveDesignSurface { System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置活动设计器。

span.span: Gets or sets the active designer.
The active designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器变为活动窗口时，应该通过设计器的用户界面将设置的属性。The property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window. 此属性的默认实现适用于的默认实现接口来通知相关的方新设计器目前处于活动状态。The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active. 如果提供您自己的实现，则应重写此属性以适当地通知你的服务。If you provide your own implementation of , you should override this property to notify your service appropriately. 此属性可以设置为`null`，指示没有设计器处于活动状态。This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.

Creates an instance of a design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface CreateDesignSurface(class System.IServiceProvider parentProvider) cil managed
Public Function CreateDesignSurface (parentProvider As IServiceProvider) As DesignSurface

param.name: parentProvider

span.span: A parent service provider.

param.span: 将创建一个新的合并服务提供程序，它将首先向此提供程序请求一个服务，然后将任何失败委托给设计图面管理器对象。

span.span: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.

param.span: 此合并提供程序将被传递到 方法中。

span.span: This merged provider will be passed into the method.
Creates an instance of a design surface.
A new design surface instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要方便地添加其他每个设计器服务，使用`parentProvider`参数来为此设计图面中提供的服务提供程序。If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface. 方法创建的合并的服务提供程序能够满足从给定的服务提供程序的服务请求以及本身。The method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the itself. 方法随后将传递到此服务提供商方法。The method then passes this service provider into the method. 后返回设计图面上，方法尝试获取。After returns the design surface, the method tries to obtain the . 如果不存在，并且它是服务的实例，默认情况下，提供方法引发事件。If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that provided by default, the method raises the event.

span.span: is .

span.para: 如果已提供服务的外部实现，它是派生自的类的责任类引发事件。
If an external implementation of the service was provided, it is the responsibility of the class that derives from the class to raise the event.

span.span: This is either an instance of or an object that implements , and represents a merge between the service provider of the class and an externally passed provider.

summary.span: 可创建设计图面的实现。

span.span: Implementation that creates the design surface.
A new design surface instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用两个方法。The method is called by both methods. 它是实际创建设计图面的实现。It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface. 默认实现只返回一个新。The default implementation just returns a new . 你可以重写该方法以提供自定义对象派生自类。You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性实现直接的顶部，因此如果你提供的该服务实现，此属性使用您的实现。The property is implemented directly on top of , so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共方法遵循标准模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法将销毁设计图面管理器。Calling this method destroys the design surface manager. 它还将释放导致实现的所有服务的服务容器也被释放。It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement to also be disposed. 此方法的受保护的版本是`virtual`，它遵循普通模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因为不具有任何本机代码，以清理时，它不具有终结器调用。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果你需要调用，你必须自己添加一个终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共方法遵循标准模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法将销毁设计图面管理器。Calling this method destroys the design surface manager. 它还将释放导致实现的所有服务的服务容器也被释放。It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement to also be disposed. 此方法的受保护的版本是`virtual`，它遵循普通模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因为不具有任何本机代码，以清理时，它不具有终结器调用。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果你需要调用，你必须自己添加一个终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将转发到任何服务提供程序在构造时提供给设计图面管理器。The method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
